description.@en: Thanks to my life at sea, I’m sure-footed and nimble— otherwise, how would I keep my footing on icy decks or during rough storms?

data.notes: Every Profession possesses a unique knack, an ability that no other Profession has access to. The Trait immediately follows the Profession’s description.

effect.@en: You may flip the results to succeed at Coordination Tests. When you succeed, it is always considered a Critical Success. In addition, when using the Movement subtype of Swimming, add your Initiative value to the Distance you swim.
